DOC.brief_summary: This study aim compare short term outcome SALC conventional laparoscopic cholecystectomy ( CLC ) .
DOC.brief_title: Quality Life Measures After Single Access Vs Conventional Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy : Prospective Randomized Study .
DOC.detailed_description: In prospective study , two hundred fifty patient symptomatic gall bladder stone randomize SALC conventional laparoscopic cholecystectomy ( CLC ) ( 125 group ) . The primary endpoint study ass total outcome quality life use EuroQoL EQ-5D questionnaire . The secondary endpoint postoperative pain , analgesia requirement duration , operative time , perioperative complication , estimate blood loss , hospital stay , cosmoses outcome number day require return normal activity .
DOC.criteria: GALL BLADDER STONES ACUTE CHOLECYSTITIS PREVIOUS LAPAROTOMY ASA ABOVE 3
